modName: Compatibility patch for Requiem - Ethereal Elven Overhaul
summary: Makes Ethereal Elven Overhaul compatible with Requiem
descriptionHtml:
Makes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/]Requiem[/url]. In case of stats, perks, etc. I carried edits from Requiem.esp and in case of visuals I carried edits from ethereal_elven_overhaul.esp. I also recommend you looking at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46067]thordir's patches[/url] for DLCs and other great mods.

[size=5pt][u]Why[/u][/size]
If you are wondering why patch is required, when everything that EEO does is making elves more beautiful, there's the reason: Both mods makes edits to few same records, and Requiem overwrites EEO changes and vice versa (depending on load order), so this mods merges those changes into one esp.

[size=5pt][u]Requirements[/u][/size]
Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url] - Version 2.0.7 or greater.
Ethereal Elven Overhaul 1.1.1
Requiem 1.8.1.1

[size=5pt][u]Load Order[/u][/size]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Skyrim Unofficial Patch.esp
Dawnguard.esm
[Other ESMs/ESPs]
Requiem.esp
[Other ESPs]
ethereal_elven_overhaul.esp
Requiem - Ethereal Elven Overhaul.esp

Use [url=http://loot.github.io/]LOOT[/url] for proper load order.

[size=5pt][u]Credits[/u][/size]
Xarrian and Ogerboss for creating Requiem
nuska for creating Ethereal Elven Overhaul
author: MrFilipenko
